S.FORM: Burma hya' ga cyux maki' tay 22 00 N, 98 00 E na Aziya' syuw kwara' kinghciyan niya' 676,578 sq km (maki' tay 40ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 653,508 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 23,070 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 56,890,418. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 19.2% , lhlahuy hya' ga 48.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 32.60%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Nay Pyi DawRangoon (Yangon). snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 4 na tay qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Htin Kyaw, aring ryax 30 squ byacing tay 3 sa kawas 2016 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. gwahan na pila spyang nqu sptyuwaw Kokka Burma qani ga mqumah, qutux qutux kawas ggalan nqu ssquli ga wayal s mt 1180 pila na Amirika , nyux mtywaw squ mqumah qani ga wayal hminas sa 60% kin hmayan na squliq , pinbahuw naha ga pagay,mugi ,bilus ru llamu , rhyan na Kokka wayal 'mumuk nqu lhlahuy nya ga kya wayal tehuk squ 50%, llahuy nya ga cingay qu lklokah na qqhoniq ki hmit na 柚木. Koba ppcyagun naha hya ga maki qu pbwax squ pagay , hmrhil squ qhoniq, pshut squ abura, kbalay squ ttekuy na Kikay ,lamu na kwang_u ki'an pcywawgun.kwang_u qani ga maki qu si, 鎢, sing, arumi abura, 鋼玉ru btunux na wi, maki uzi qu紅寶石及翡翠sun naha maha spyang blaq balaya nqu aninu na Kokka qu wi na btunux qani. 21 Seci tringan nqu Burma ttnaq kwara nqu qbaqan gwahan squ pila, ana ga ini psraya maki squ babaw minsazing pintriqan , qzinah rrok maki squ zik na minsazing pintriqan.skahul squ pinspngan krahu na qpzing lmbuw,1936 kawas maki zik Kokka na Burma kinbalay naha squ qeqaya ga (GDP)wal tehuk squ121.97ok qu pila na Amirika(trang nasa ga kinhmayan nqu squliq naha ga1570.8 mang),squliq nqu naha ga qutux kawas qutux hi galan naha ga776 pila na Amirika , ga maki squ 2004kawas 11byazing lpgaun naha kwara qu lpgan, squliq naqu Kokka Burma qutux kawas ptnaqun mita squ kilbalay naha qu qeqaya ga nanak 356 pila na Amirika qutux kawas galun naha qutux hi spngun mita ga wal mhhuy rrok lozi,Inihzinas squ misazing mintciriq squ kawas 'nagal naha qutux kawas ga776 pila na Amirika .sun qani mita ga gwahan pila na Burma ga nyux balay si tpru ru nyux msbzinah. maki squ 2011 kawas Sotow naha musa kkyal nqu kraya ,kmal maha mosa sbahul kwara qu gwahan na pila qani la , mosa glabang qu zyuwaw na mmosa naha tbazi bbziran qani ,sbahun qu bbiq Giking ru zyuwaw na Horit,taqu kahul squ binah mwah tbali bbziran swayal qani maki sa2010 kawas300 Mang pila na Amirika wayal msrayas wagi obih tehuk squ 20 ok pila na Amirika,pspngun qu zyuwaw naha ga 667:1.zyuwaw nqu snbah 'miyw plpila quni ga wal msrayas qu pila na Burma obih tehuk sa 25%. 2011 kawas qani ga wal tmwang wagiq qu gwahan na pila kilwagiq nya ga 8.8%,kwara qu kinbalay nqu squliq na Kokka Burma qani ga qutux kawas baqun magal squ pila ga wayal msrayas wagi te1300 pila na Amirika. nyux si k'atu Toc krahu nqu kkbaly yal nqu ngngasan , wal hriqan nqu Sexu na Burma 580 ok pila na Amirika ps'rux squ土瓦ki'an na rhyan gwahan na pila,mosa msqun ki zzik na qsya hhnawan nqu qasu qu kska ,kinhgcyan nqu hryan qani ga wal sa Mang kubu,misuw qani lga Sexu na Burma ki 泰國 wal pinsurux min blaq mkkal mosa cingay qu squnun naha mtywawa ,babaw nya ga mmosa ps'rux kbalay squ kuba kahul squ qsya ggwahn nqu Rengki , lamu na kuba shwa ru kklayan na abura, taqu Cyuko , 南韓ki印度ga nyux balay akismoya mwah Toc.nyux aki maha qu Sexu na Burma maha aki m'kska nqu ki'an na ht'gan wagi ru mkura kilux ki tehuk squ 印度洋qu gwahan na pila ma. maki squ 1997 kawas 7 byacing 23 ryax myup squ linhoyan nqu Kokka東南亞 ,ru mgluw squ linhoyan nqu ziyuw nqu tbziran na rhyan Cyuko , 東協- linhoyan nqu ziyuw nqu tbziran na rhyan韓國, 東協 – msbbes ki gwahan na pila Gipun qu slpyungan naha, 東協 –澳大利亞,紐西蘭ziyuw nqu tbziran na rhyan ki東協－印度ziyuw nqu tbziran na rhyan ru baq mpkal mssqun mtywaw,inihngaw gmluw linhuyan ru kwara nqu zyuwaw na pinkyalan nqu ziyuw nqu tbziran. zyuwaw nqu spyang inrasan nqu inlungan gwahan pila na Burma hya ga siki mtnaq ru msqutux qu knita nqu linhuyan gwahan pila qani qu spyang ma, mosa tnaq qu qeqaya ru pintywaw ,Toc, siki lluhay qu pptywaw nqu mtywaw , siki s'agan naha squ pinkya lan naha maha pinkyalan balay gan maha mosa krahu qu ''wah nayuwaw. teta msrayas m'wagi qu qinhlan kwara ka rrhyan Burma qani ga mutux gmluw linhuyan naqu binah na Kokka musa gmluw東亞峰會 ,yal nqu印度-Taypinyang Taypinyang qani ga nyux mstnaq squ spyang na pklahang ptzyuwaw squ squli政治, nyux aki mwah pspung gmluw mkkal ru msqun mtywaw ywaw na Anzing ru gwahan na pila .東亞qaniy ga maki aqu kwara na rhyan ga spyang balay maki qu kilblaq ny rhyan qani ga gwahan na pila kahul squ lamu na ggwahan ru msqutux . rhyan maki qu sinqunan binah na Kokka Burma cyux maki te ht'gan wagi mkura kilux Ya nqu tekyopan wagi mkura tltu, ht'gan wagi ru Cyuko cyux msobih qu寮國ki泰國hya tekyopan wagi ru印度 ki Kokk anqu 孟加拉hya gacyux mubuy .maki squ tekyopan wagi mkura kilux obih mkpyut孟加拉wan , mkura te mkura kilux bsilung nq安達曼.lihgcyuan nya ga676,578 pinbng kung ri,mkia squ te ht'gan wagi mkura kilux Ya nqu rhyan Terik ga spyang krahu nqu Kokka. cyugal squ rgiyx cyux hmgiru squ Burma, te kyopan wagi ga maki qu rgyx 若開,maki squ mkura tltu ga maki qu rgyx nqu 喜馬拉雅 ,sbngun mhuw squ ubuy nqu rygix , ht'gan wagi ru te ht'gan wagi mkura kilux ga wagiq na rgiyx 撣邦ki ygiyx 丹那沙林, maki squ kska hya ga be'nux qu rhyan nya.taqu rgiyx nqu喜馬拉雅cyux maki squ zik kska te mkura tltu kinwagi qn 開加博峰hya ga5881mi,spyang wagiq na Kokka Burma ki ht'gan wagi mkura kilux Ya. spyang nqu llyung naha ga maki squ ru錫唐河qani kwara.zik nqu qani ga 伊洛瓦底江 puqing nya ga kahul squ Cyuko nqu rhyan 西藏林芝 , mkura kilux pwah squ kska rhyan nqu Burma,pucing nya lga mwah msri squbsilung na 安達曼 . squliq nqu Burma ga cingay qu cyux mqyanux squllyung rhyan nqu伊洛瓦底,spyang balay llyung nqu Burma. kayal nya ga yal nqu mkiluxmkilux qu behuy nya. be'nux qu gong 'bagan laga cingay qu qwalax ru msu'ut qu kilux, kami zik rhyan nqu Cyuko ga mtkyay. kinhmayan nqu squliq ru ''tayal naha puqing na pinkgan主條目:kinhmayan nqu squliq ru ''tayal nqu Burma kya wayal squ zmagal seng mang qu squliq Kokka na Burma,68%hya ga緬族.taqu ''tayal nqu cikuy na mirok ga yan nqu撣族(9%),克倫族(7%),若開族(3.5%),華人(2.5%),孟族(2%),克欽族(1.5%),克耶族(0.75%)ru kinkwara. nqu tekuy na mirok ga(4.5%),ru maki uzi qu squliq na 印度ki squliq na 孟加mnwah tmwang nqu squliq hya ga(1.25%).ana ga tthoki nqu Burma hya ga ini naha swali qu squliq na theluw ni Burma(swalan naha qu squliq na果敢華),squliq na印度,squliq na孟加拉ki squliq na羅興亞 naha ga sinwalan nqu Horit maha kikuy na Minro(sexu nqu Burma ini swan maha squliq na羅興亞ga m'Mirok na Burma wal nya spsquni kisquliq na 孟加拉). Ke Kkayal naha squ ke na tthoki hya ga ke nqu Kokka Burma(ke nqu yayana 緬族),kwara nyx maki squ zik rhyan na Burma nqu cikuy na mirok ga kmal squ ke naha nanak.Ke nqu Teluw hya ga siki maki te zik nqu ki'an Teluw na Burma ga spkal naha, maki squ rhyan mkura te tltu nqu Burma cikuy nqu mirok mutux mkkal uzi ken aha. cingay balay qu wagi cintmanna squliq ga baq kmayal ke na Amirik . yalaw gi bsyaq qu skahul naha inlung mtyuwaw squ Sexu na hitay Burma maha sqtuxn naha qu ken aha, nanu yasa qu ana maki squ binah na rhyan qu ''tayal naha kya ru maki squ pqwasan biru uzi ga sqhut naha kmal squ ke naha nanak.memwaw mhuw kya qu ini bqasi na inllungan binah nqu 'tayal naha kya.nanu yasa qu n_gyut mskongat ini kayal ke naha nanak la.s'wayan qani ga ana qinhtan mlahang cikay nqu大英帝國 qu rhyan na Burma qaniy,uxun su ini kitehok uzi qu qeqaya pcbaq ,maki squ zik Kokka naha ga ini kayal ke nqu Amirik , nyux m'nanak nqu zik qinhtan nqu rhyan naha. ppsbaq kwara squliq na Burma baq mita squ bnrwan ga kyawal squ 94.75%.gmluw squ maha siki pqwsun qu 'laqiq cikuy ga . sbcyun qu ppsbq zik na 'osa mqbaq biru nqu 'laqi,cinpuqing nqu ppsbq ru wagiq na ppcbq. misuw qani ga maki squ 40876 mang qu cinringan ppcbq na pwasan biru,krahu pqwasn biru ru lamu na krahu pqwasan hya ga 108 kbhul kwara qu pqwasan biru,pqwasn nqu mmosa m'sinsi hyaga 20 kwara pqwasn biru ,pwqasan biru nqu hminas nqu kinbalay ki spyang na kinbaqan krahu pqwasn biru ga maki 63 qu pqwasn nya,zik nqu krahu pqwasn biru ru lamu na krahu pqwasn hya ga 22qu pqwasn naha.maki qu lalu na pqwasn biru hya ga 仰光krahu pqwasn biru ki 曼德勒krahu pqwasn biru. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Borma hya' ga cyox maki' tay 22 00 N, 98 00 E na Aziya' syow kwara' kinghciyan niya' 676,578 sq km (maki' tay 40ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 653,508 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 23,070 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 56,890,418. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 19.2% , lhlahoy hya' ga 48.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 32.60%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Nay Pyi DawRangoon (Yangon). snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 4 na tay qotox byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Htin Kyaw, aring ryax 30 sqo byacing tay 3 sa kawas 2016 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. gwahan na pila spyang nqo sptyowaw Kokka Borma qani ga mqomah, qotox qotox kawas ggalan nqo ssqoli ga wayal s mt 1180 pila na Amirika , nyox mtywaw sqo mqomah qani ga wayal hminas sa 60% kin hmayan na sqoliq , pinbahow naha ga pagay,mogi ,bilos ro llamo , rhyan na Kokka wayal 'momok nqo lhlahoy nya ga kya wayal tehok sqo 50%, llahoy nya ga cingay qo lklokah na qqhoniq ki hmit na 柚木. Koba ppcyagon naha hya ga maki qo pbwax sqo pagay , hmrhil sqo qhoniq, pshot sqo abora, kbalay sqo ttekoy na Kikay ,lamo na kwang_o ki'an pcywawgon.kwang_o qani ga maki qo si, 鎢, sing, aromi abora, 鋼玉ro btonox na wi, maki ozi qo紅寶石及翡翠son naha maha spyang blaq balaya nqo anino na Kokka qo wi na btonox qani. 21 Seci tringan nqo Borma ttnaq kwara nqo qbaqan gwahan sqo pila, ana ga ini psraya maki sqo babaw minsazing pintriqan , qzinah rrok maki sqo zik na minsazing pintriqan.skahol sqo pinspngan kraho na qpzing lmbow,1936 kawas maki zik Kokka na Borma kinbalay naha sqo qeqaya ga (GDP)wal tehok sqo121.97ok qo pila na Amirika(trang nasa ga kinhmayan nqo sqoliq naha ga1570.8 mang),sqoliq nqo naha ga qotox kawas qotox hi galan naha ga776 pila na Amirika , ga maki sqo 2004kawas 11byazing lpgaon naha kwara qo lpgan, sqoliq naqo Kokka Borma qotox kawas ptnaqon mita sqo kilbalay naha qo qeqaya ga nanak 356 pila na Amirika qotox kawas galon naha qotox hi spngon mita ga wal mhhoy rrok lozi,Inihzinas sqo misazing mintciriq sqo kawas 'nagal naha qotox kawas ga776 pila na Amirika .son qani mita ga gwahan pila na Borma ga nyox balay si tpro ro nyox msbzinah. maki sqo 2011 kawas Sotow naha mosa kkyal nqo kraya ,kmal maha mosa sbahol kwara qo gwahan na pila qani la , mosa glabang qo zyowaw na mmosa naha tbazi bbziran qani ,sbahon qo bbiq Giking ro zyowaw na Horit,taqo kahol sqo binah mwah tbali bbziran swayal qani maki sa2010 kawas300 Mang pila na Amirika wayal msrayas wagi obih tehok sqo 20 ok pila na Amirika,pspngon qo zyowaw naha ga 667:1.zyowaw nqo snbah 'miyw plpila qoni ga wal msrayas qo pila na Borma obih tehok sa 25%. 2011 kawas qani ga wal tmwang wagiq qo gwahan na pila kilwagiq nya ga 8.8%,kwara qo kinbalay nqo sqoliq na Kokka Borma qani ga qotox kawas baqon magal sqo pila ga wayal msrayas wagi te1300 pila na Amirika. nyox si k'ato Toc kraho nqo kkbaly yal nqo ngngasan , wal hriqan nqo Sexo na Borma 580 ok pila na Amirika ps'rox sqo土瓦ki'an na rhyan gwahan na pila,mosa msqon ki zzik na qsya hhnawan nqo qaso qo kska ,kinhgcyan nqo hryan qani ga wal sa Mang kobo,misow qani lga Sexo na Borma ki 泰國 wal pinsorox min blaq mkkal mosa cingay qo sqonon naha mtywawa ,babaw nya ga mmosa ps'rox kbalay sqo koba kahol sqo qsya ggwahn nqo Rengki , lamo na koba shwa ro kklayan na abora, taqo Cyoko , 南韓ki印度ga nyox balay akismoya mwah Toc.nyox aki maha qo Sexo na Borma maha aki m'kska nqo ki'an na ht'gan wagi ro mkora kilox ki tehok sqo 印度洋qo gwahan na pila ma. maki sqo 1997 kawas 7 byacing 23 ryax myop sqo linhoyan nqo Kokka東南亞 ,ro mglow sqo linhoyan nqo ziyow nqo tbziran na rhyan Cyoko , 東協- linhoyan nqo ziyow nqo tbziran na rhyan韓國, 東協 – msbbes ki gwahan na pila Gipon qo slpyongan naha, 東協 –澳大利亞,紐西蘭ziyow nqo tbziran na rhyan ki東協－印度ziyow nqo tbziran na rhyan ro baq mpkal mssqon mtywaw,inihngaw gmlow linhoyan ro kwara nqo zyowaw na pinkyalan nqo ziyow nqo tbziran. zyowaw nqo spyang inrasan nqo inlongan gwahan pila na Borma hya ga siki mtnaq ro msqotox qo knita nqo linhoyan gwahan pila qani qo spyang ma, mosa tnaq qo qeqaya ro pintywaw ,Toc, siki llohay qo pptywaw nqo mtywaw , siki s'agan naha sqo pinkya lan naha maha pinkyalan balay gan maha mosa kraho qo ''wah nayowaw. teta msrayas m'wagi qo qinhlan kwara ka rrhyan Borma qani ga motox gmlow linhoyan naqo binah na Kokka mosa gmlow東亞峰會 ,yal nqo印度-Taypinyang Taypinyang qani ga nyox mstnaq sqo spyang na pklahang ptzyowaw sqo sqoli政治, nyox aki mwah pspong gmlow mkkal ro msqon mtywaw ywaw na Anzing ro gwahan na pila .東亞qaniy ga maki aqo kwara na rhyan ga spyang balay maki qo kilblaq ny rhyan qani ga gwahan na pila kahol sqo lamo na ggwahan ro msqotox . rhyan maki qo sinqonan binah na Kokka Borma cyox maki te ht'gan wagi mkora kilox Ya nqo tekyopan wagi mkora tlto, ht'gan wagi ro Cyoko cyox msobih qo寮國ki泰國hya tekyopan wagi ro印度 ki Kokk anqo 孟加拉hya gacyox moboy .maki sqo tekyopan wagi mkora kilox obih mkpyot孟加拉wan , mkora te mkora kilox bsilong nq安達曼.lihgcyoan nya ga676,578 pinbng kong ri,mkia sqo te ht'gan wagi mkora kilox Ya nqo rhyan Terik ga spyang kraho nqo Kokka. cyogal sqo rgiyx cyox hmgiro sqo Borma, te kyopan wagi ga maki qo rgyx 若開,maki sqo mkora tlto ga maki qo rgyx nqo 喜馬拉雅 ,sbngon mhow sqo oboy nqo rygix , ht'gan wagi ro te ht'gan wagi mkora kilox ga wagiq na rgiyx 撣邦ki ygiyx 丹那沙林, maki sqo kska hya ga be'nox qo rhyan nya.taqo rgiyx nqo喜馬拉雅cyox maki sqo zik kska te mkora tlto kinwagi qn 開加博峰hya ga5881mi,spyang wagiq na Kokka Borma ki ht'gan wagi mkora kilox Ya. spyang nqo llyong naha ga maki sqo ro錫唐河qani kwara.zik nqo qani ga 伊洛瓦底江 poqing nya ga kahol sqo Cyoko nqo rhyan 西藏林芝 , mkora kilox pwah sqo kska rhyan nqo Borma,pocing nya lga mwah msri sqobsilong na 安達曼 . sqoliq nqo Borma ga cingay qo cyox mqyanox sqollyong rhyan nqo伊洛瓦底,spyang balay llyong nqo Borma. kayal nya ga yal nqo mkiloxmkilox qo behoy nya. be'nox qo gong 'bagan laga cingay qo qwalax ro mso'ot qo kilox, kami zik rhyan nqo Cyoko ga mtkyay. kinhmayan nqo sqoliq ro ''tayal naha poqing na pinkgan主條目:kinhmayan nqo sqoliq ro ''tayal nqo Borma kya wayal sqo zmagal seng mang qo sqoliq Kokka na Borma,68%hya ga緬族.taqo ''tayal nqo cikoy na mirok ga yan nqo撣族(9%),克倫族(7%),若開族(3.5%),華人(2.5%),孟族(2%),克欽族(1.5%),克耶族(0.75%)ro kinkwara. nqo tekoy na mirok ga(4.5%),ro maki ozi qo sqoliq na 印度ki sqoliq na 孟加mnwah tmwang nqo sqoliq hya ga(1.25%).ana ga tthoki nqo Borma hya ga ini naha swali qo sqoliq na thelow ni Borma(swalan naha qo sqoliq na果敢華),sqoliq na印度,sqoliq na孟加拉ki sqoliq na羅興亞 naha ga sinwalan nqo Horit maha kikoy na Minro(sexo nqo Borma ini swan maha sqoliq na羅興亞ga m'Mirok na Borma wal nya spsqoni kisqoliq na 孟加拉). Ke Kkayal naha sqo ke na tthoki hya ga ke nqo Kokka Borma(ke nqo yayana 緬族),kwara nyx maki sqo zik rhyan na Borma nqo cikoy na mirok ga kmal sqo ke naha nanak.Ke nqo Telow hya ga siki maki te zik nqo ki'an Telow na Borma ga spkal naha, maki sqo rhyan mkora te tlto nqo Borma cikoy nqo mirok motox mkkal ozi ken aha. cingay balay qo wagi cintmanna sqoliq ga baq kmayal ke na Amirik . yalaw gi bsyaq qo skahol naha inlong mtyowaw sqo Sexo na hitay Borma maha sqtoxn naha qo ken aha, nano yasa qo ana maki sqo binah na rhyan qo ''tayal naha kya ro maki sqo pqwasan biro ozi ga sqhot naha kmal sqo ke naha nanak.memwaw mhow kya qo ini bqasi na inllongan binah nqo 'tayal naha kya.nano yasa qo n_gyot mskongat ini kayal ke naha nanak la.s'wayan qani ga ana qinhtan mlahang cikay nqo大英帝國 qo rhyan na Borma qaniy,oxon so ini kitehok ozi qo qeqaya pcbaq ,maki sqo zik Kokka naha ga ini kayal ke nqo Amirik , nyox m'nanak nqo zik qinhtan nqo rhyan naha. ppsbaq kwara sqoliq na Borma baq mita sqo bnrwan ga kyawal sqo 94.75%.gmlow sqo maha siki pqwson qo 'laqiq cikoy ga . sbcyon qo ppsbq zik na 'osa mqbaq biro nqo 'laqi,cinpoqing nqo ppsbq ro wagiq na ppcbq. misow qani ga maki sqo 40876 mang qo cinringan ppcbq na pwasan biro,kraho pqwasn biro ro lamo na kraho pqwasan hya ga 108 kbhol kwara qo pqwasan biro,pqwasn nqo mmosa m'sinsi hyaga 20 kwara pqwasn biro ,pwqasan biro nqo hminas nqo kinbalay ki spyang na kinbaqan kraho pqwasn biro ga maki 63 qo pqwasn nya,zik nqo kraho pqwasn biro ro lamo na kraho pqwasn hya ga 22qo pqwasn naha.maki qo lalo na pqwasn biro hya ga 仰光kraho pqwasn biro ki 曼德勒kraho pqwasn biro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
